page.title: 14Brockhampton House
page.content: Brockhampton House is a very popular house on Brockhampton.It is a private house and it is very old.It stands in Brockhampton park it has a beautiful countryside around it.Lots of people have stayed in it they have heard that it has been haunted.It is built of red brick and it has big windows.It is a Victorian house and it was probably built in the late 1800's.It is now surrounded by woodlands which belongs to the National Trust,which is open to the public and is readily accessible by two roads.Each road has a lodge and gates by their entrances.It is now being repaired and built into offices. They are leaving the face of the house and building the inside of it.Brockhampton House got its name from a badger because badgers used to be called brocks and so it was called Brockhampton.
